Notes.Text:
This update for moinmoin-wiki to version 1.9.10 fixes the following security issue:

- CVE-2017-5934: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in the GUI editor (boo#1111104)
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Package Hub for SUSE Linux Enterprise 15

Vulnerabilities.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the link dialogue in GUI editor in MoinMoin before 1.9.10 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

ProductID: SUSE Package Hub for SUSE Linux Enterprise 15:moinmoin-wiki-1.9.10-bp150.3.4.1
